description: New blocks â€“ Constant follow-up in meetings with MDPL and Propcare for LT connection. BESCOM can supply power, but setup costs must be paid. Approx. Rs. 50,000 per flat. Power sub-committee formation in progress.
Builder stated orally that they have requested payment release in their Escrow account from Piramal, who now have a revenue-sharing arrangement with MDPL.
Regular monitoring and maintenance are ongoing.
Work is progressing slowly due to contractor changes at GAIL. Connections have started for Block 2 and Block 3.
Maintenance works are ongoing as required.
Renewal work is in progress as committed by MDPL.
MDPL confirmed that draft OC has been received, and drawings are being certified before receiving the hard copy.
MDPL has started paying pending vendor dues, though slowly.
Propcare has yet to justify or withdraw the extra maintenance invoice raised.
Project-related tasks are delayed, citing lack of funds.
